original_text: Also, remember what happened to the cities called Sodom and Gomorrah, and the other cities that were near them. Like those bad angels, the people who lived in those places were also doing evil things. They were having sex with people who were not their husbands or their wives. They liked to have sex in other ways that are not right. God destroyed their cities. He has punished them with fire that never stops burning. That is an example of what will happen to wicked people like them.
korean_text: 소돔과 고모라와 그 이웃 도시들도 그들과 같은 행동으로 음란하며 다른 육체를 따라 가다가 영원한 불의 형벌을 받음으로 거울이 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: to the cities called Sodom and Gomorrah
sentences.korean_translation: 소돔과 고모라라 불리는 도시들에게 일어난 일을

sentences.original_text: and the other cities that were near them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 근처에 있던 다른 도시들에게 일어난 일을

sentences.original_text: the people who lived in those places
They were having sex with people
who were not their husbands or their wives
They liked to have sex in other ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 방식으로 성관계하는 것을 좋아했다

sentences.original_text: He has punished them with fire
of what will happen to wicked people like them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 같은 악인들에게 무슨 일이 일어날 것인지에 대한
